pages.title: The Campfire is your Bestie!
pages.text: Stop everything and start looking for one. If you can't find it, craft it IMMEDIATELY! Why, you ask? $(br)It will:$(li)Protect you from freezing to death$(li)Enable the 'save game' option$(li)Cook food$(li)Heal you$(li)Purify water$(li)Scare off monsters$(br)... and more!
